animal.question: I quack and waddle. I like to swim in a lake. What am I?

hints.text: 🐥 I am yellow when I am little.
🌾 I like to eat seeds and bugs.
🦆 I am a type of bird.

animal.question: I am big and gray, with a long trunk and big ears. What am I?

hints.text: 🥜 I love to eat peanuts.
🚿 I use my trunk to spray water.
🐘 I am the largest land animal.

animal.question: I say 'Meow' and love to chase mice. What am I?

hints.text: 🧶 I like to play with yarn.
🥛 I like to drink milk.
🐈‍⬛ I purr when you pet me.

animal.question: I have a long neck and eat leaves from tall trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🦒 I have spots.
🌿 I eat plants.
🌍 I live in Africa.

animal.question: I live in the ocean and have eight arms. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I live in the sea
🐙 I have no bones.
💧 I can squirt ink.

animal.question: I hop around and carry my baby in a pouch. What am I?

hints.text: 🇦🇺 I live in Australia.
🐾 I have strong legs.
👶 I carry my joey.

animal.question: I build dams and chew on wood with my big teeth. What am I?

hints.text: 🌲 I like to build things with wood.
🦷 I have very large front teeth.
💧 I live near rivers and lakes.

animal.question: I am a reptile with a hard shell on my back. I am very slow. What am I?

hints.text: 🥬 I like to eat lettuce.
🐢 I can hide in my shell.
🌳 I live on land and in water.

animal.question: I am a nocturnal mammal that can fly. What am I?

hints.text: 🦇 I sleep during the day.
🍎 Some of us like to eat fruit.
🌃 I use echolocation to find my way.

animal.question: I am a striped horse-like animal that lives in Africa. What am I?

hints.text: 🦓 My stripes are unique to each individual
🌾 I eat grass.
🌍 I live on the African plains.

bug.question: I have six legs and can fly. I like to buzz around flowers. What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I make honey.
🐝 I have yellow and black stripes.
🌷 I collect nectar.

bug.question: I hop around and can be green. I have strong legs for jumping. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I like to eat plants.
🐸 I am not an amphibian, but I can jump like one!
🦗 Some people think I bring good luck.

bug.question: I have many legs and crawl on the ground. I often live in anthills. What am I?

hints.text: 🧺 I carry things that are bigger than me!
🐜 I live in a colony.
💪 I am known for being strong for my size.

bug.question: I start as a caterpillar and then change into something beautiful that flies. What am I?

hints.text: 🎨 I have colorful wings.
🐛 I go through a transformation called metamorphosis.
🌸 I like to drink nectar from flowers with a long straw-like mouth.

bug.question: I like to eat wood and can cause damage to houses. I live in colonies.

hints.text: 🏠 I can weaken wooden structures.
🐜 I am sometimes mistaken for an ant.
🪵 My favorite snack is the inside of trees.

bug.question: I am a small beetle, usually red with black spots. People consider me lucky. What am I?

hints.text: 🐞 I'm often called a ladybird.
🔴 I can fly but I am very small.
🌱 Gardeners like me because I eat aphids.

bug.question: I make a sticky web to catch my food. I have eight legs, not six. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ My home is very strong and can hold things.
🕷️ I am an arachnid.
🪰 I eat flies and other small insects.

bug.question: I can glow in the dark and light up the night sky. What am I?

hints.text: 💡 I create my own light source.
🪲 I am a type of beetle.
🌙 You can often see me during summer nights.

bug.question: I bite and leave itchy red bumps. I fly around and buzz in your ear at night. What am I?

hints.text: 🩸 Only the females do this!
🦟 I am annoying in the summer.
🌃 I like to come out when it's dark.

bug.question: I am known for my loud chirping sound at night. I am related to grasshoppers. What am I?

hints.text: 🌙 I make music in the evenings.
🦗 I'm long and thin and like to hide in grass.
🎶 I rub my wings together to make my sound.
